statement.tex: \text{Find the domain and range of the}\\ \text{following real function} \\ \qquad f(x) = -\vert x\vert
\\ \textbf{Right or wrong? }f(x)\text{ is effectively equal}\\ \text{to the following.}

reason.tex: \vert x\vert = \begin{cases} -x, x\lt 0 \\ x, x\geq 0 \end{cases} \implies -\vert x\vert = \begin{cases} x, x\lt 0 \\ -x, x\geq 0 \end{cases} \\ \text{In other words, }f(x) = -\vert x\vert\leq 0\text{ for all }x\in\mathbb{R}.
f(x)\text{ is defined for all }x\implies\textbf{ domain }=\mathbb{R}.\\ \text{But }f(x)\leq 0\text{ for all }x\implies\textbf{ range }=(-\infty, 0].
